ygData.subject: Re: neglected melee skills..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... By Gollee !!!!!!  That would explain the Research , Only being able to put one point into it at level 16. -- Jamie Macdonald A.K.A Magis DarkStone
ygData.messageBody:
William Greene wrote:

> From: "William Greene" <wrg@...>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: TkAdam@... <TkAdam@...>
> To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
> Date: Thursday, May 13, 1999 7:17 AM
> Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] neglected melee skills..
>
> Not sure if this was stated or not but the reason it is this way with things
> you put a point in is if you acquire a skill and have 0 and put 1 point in
> it it will give you your current level of points. example: level 8 wizard
> puts one point into conjuration he would then have a 8 conjuration skill.
>
>

By Gollee !!!!!! That would explain the Research , Only being able to put one point into it at level 16.



--

Jamie Macdonald

A.K.A
Magis DarkStone
Mercenary Mage

-----------------------------------------------------------

"I've been a Wizard, Magician, Sorcerer, And Charlatan."

"But I've always been a Loner by Nature
and A Lurker by Want"

"Knowledge Is Power, Learn how to use It"
